collaborations.title: Meandering Rio Commons
collaborations.role: Collaborator, data + mapping systems, 3D site, publication contributions
collaborations.description:
Co-created with José Villanueva, Land Arts of the American West, and a broader research network. The project visualizes historical meanders of the Rio Grande / Rio Bravo river through a web-based 3D environment and open geographic data, and was featured in Southwest Contemporary Vol. 5 and the publication Al Río / To the River by Zoe Leonard.

Visit the online archive.
